as libraryName,e.lib_design as libDesign,(case when e.lib_layout=1 then 'Single' when e.lib_layout=2 then 'Paired' end) as libLayout,ep.platform_name as platform,elso.source_name as source,elst.strategy_name as strategy ,els.selection_name as selection,e.lib_insert_size as insertSize,e.release_time as releaseTime,c.accession as dataset,p.accession as projectAcc,p.title as projectTitle ,p.description as projectDesc,s.accession as sampleAcc,s.name as sampleName,s.title as sampleTitle,s.public_description as sampleDesc,st.sample_type_name as sampleType, s.taxon_id as taxId,t.name_txt as organism,e.release_state as releaseState,CONCAT("https://ngdc.cncb.ac.cn/gsa/browse/",c.accession,"/",e.accession) as url ,e.create_time as createTime,CONCAT(u.first_name," ",u.middle_name," ",u.last_name) as submitter,u.organization_standard as organization,e.planned_read_length_mate_1 as plannedReadLengthMate1 ,e.planned_read_length_mate_2 as plannedReadLengthMate2,e.lib_nominal_size as libNominalSize,e.lib_nominal_standard_deviation as libNominalStandardDeviation,e.planned_read_length as plannedReadLength,e.planned_number_of_cycles as plannedNumberOfCycles from user u,cra c ,project p ,sample s,sample_type st,taxon_name t,exp_platform ep,exp_lib_selection els,exp_lib_source elso,exp_lib_strategy elst,experiment e LEFT JOIN (select r.exp_id,rdt.run_data_type_name from run r,run_data_type rdt where r.run_data_type_id=rdt.run_data_type_id) as rr on rr.exp_id=e.exp_id where e.`status`=3 and e.release_state=2 and c.cra_id = e.cra_id and c.`status`=3 and c.release_state=2 and p.prj_id = e.prj_id and p.`status`=3 and p.release_state=2 and s.sample_id=e.sample_id and s.sample_type_id=st.sample_type_id and s.taxon_id = t.tax_id and t.name_class='scientific name' and ep.platform_id = e.platform_id and els.selection_id = e.selection_id and elso.source_id = e.source_id and elst.strategy_id = e.strategy_id and u.user_id=e.user_id group by e.accession

select 'NGDC' as center,'GSA' as type,c.accession as accession,'0' as downloadable,IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rdt.run_data_type_name),0) as fileType ,c.title as title,IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ep.platform_name),0) as platform,c.release_time as releaseTime,p.accession as projectAcc ,p.title as projectTitle,p.description as projectDesc,c.release_state as releaseState,CONCAT("https://ngdc.cncb.ac.cn/gsa/browse/",c.accession) as url, u.create_time as createTime,CONCAT(u.first_name," ",u.middle_name," ",u.last_name) as submitter,u.organization_standard as organization from user u,run r,run_data_type rdt,experiment e,exp_platform ep,project p,cra c where c.`status`=3 and r.cra_id=c.cra_id and r.run_data_type_id=rdt.run_data_type_id and e.platform_id=ep.platform_id and e.cra_id=c.cra_id and e.exp_id=r.exp_id and c.prj_id=p.prj_id and u.user_id=c.user_id group by c.accession

select 'Run' as type,r.accession as runAcc,e.accession as expAcc ,GROUP_CONCAT((case when rdf.public_root=1 then CONCAT("ftp://download.big.ac.cn/gsa",rdf.archived_file_dir) when rdf.public_root=2 then CONCAT("ftp://download.big.ac.cn/gsa2",rdf.archived_file_dir) when rdf.public_root=3 then CONCAT("ftp://download.big.ac.cn/gsa3",rdf.archived_file_dir) end)) as downloadPath,GROUP_CONCAT(rdf.archived_file_name) as fileName,GROUP_CONCAT(rdf.run_file_size) as fileSize ,CONCAT("https://ngdc.cncb.ac.cn/gsa/browse/",c.accession,"/",r.accession) as url from run r,experiment e,run_data_file rdf,cra c where r.`status`=10 and r.release_state=2 and e.exp_id=r.exp_id and r.run_id=rdf.run_id and r.cra_id=c.cra_id group by r.accession

select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.accession) as expAccs,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.accession) as runAccs,c.accession as craAcc from cra c,experiment e,run r where c.cra_id=e.cra_id and r.cra_id=c.cra_id and c.accession=#{acc} and c.`status`=3 group by c.cra_id

select 'NGDC' as center,'GSA' as type,c.accession as accession,'0' as downloadable,IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rdt.run_data_type_name),0) as fileType ,c.title as title,IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ep.platform_name),0) as platform,c.release_time as releaseTime,p.accession as projectAcc ,p.title as projectTitle,p.description as projectDesc,c.release_state as releaseState,CONCAT("https://ngdc.cncb.ac.cn/gsa/browse/",c.accession) as url, u.create_time as createTime,CONCAT(u.first_name," ",u.middle_name," ",u.last_name) as submitter,u.organization_standard as organization from user u,run r,run_data_type rdt,experiment e,exp_platform ep,project p,cra c where c.`status`=3 and r.cra_id=c.cra_id and r.run_data_type_id=rdt.run_data_type_id and e.platform_id=ep.platform_id and e.cra_id=c.cra_id and e.exp_id=r.exp_id and c.prj_id=p.prj_id and u.user_id=c.user_id and c.accession=#{acc} group by c.accession
